title: EGYPTIAN AI Challenge
description: The EGYPTIAN AI Challenge Hackathon is an exciting, fast-paced event where developers, data scientists, and tech enthusiasts collaborate to build cutting-edge AI-powered solutions. Over the course of the hackathon, participants will brainstorm, design, and prototype innovative applications leveraging machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, and automation. Whether you're a beginner or an expert, this hackathon provides a unique opportunity to network, learn from mentors, and showcase your AI skills. Compete for prizes, gain hands-on experience, and push the boundaries of artificial intelligence in a dynamic, team-driven environment!
rules: All code must be original and created during the hackathon
Use of open source libraries and APIs is allowed
Projects must be submitted before the deadline
Each team must submit a working demo, accessible github repository and a video demo.
